sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Box, Typography, Grid, Paper } from '@mui/material'
import HelpOutlinedIcon from '@mui/icons-material/HelpOutlined';


export const Details = () => {
  return (
    <Box >
      <Grid container justifyContent={'center'}>
        <Grid item xs={4} md={6} sx={{ marginTop: 3, boxShadow: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.35) 0px 5px 15px' }}>
          <Paper
            sx={{ padding: '17px', height: 'fit-content',marginLeft:'7px' }}
          >
            <form>
              <Typography sx={{fontSize:'20px'}}>Create Account</Typography>
              <Box>
                <label>
                  <Typography mt={5}mb={1}sx={{ fontSize: "16px", color: "#BD4C46" }}>
                    Account Name
                  </Typography>
                </label>

                <input
                  type='text'
                  style={{ height: '30px', width: '250px'}}
                />
              </Box>

              <Box>
                <label>
                  <Typography mt={3}mb={1}sx={{ fontSize: "16px",  }}>
                    Account Code <HelpOutlinedIcon sx={{height:'18px',m}}/>
                  </Typography>
                </label>

                <input
                  type='text'
                  style={{ height: '30px', width: '250px'}}
                />
              </Box>

              <Box>
                <label>
                  <Typography mt={3}mb={1}sx={{ fontSize: "16px",color:"#BD4C46"  }}>
                    Account Type
                  </Typography>
                </label>

                <input
                
                  type='text'
                  style={{ height: '30px', width: '250px'}}
                />
              </Box>

              <Box>
                <label>
                  <Typography
                    mt={2}
                    mb={1}
                    sx={{ fontSize: "16px", color: "#000" }}
                  >
                     Description 
                  </Typography>
                </label>

                <textarea
                  rows={3}
                  cols={25}
                  placeholder="Max 500 characters"
                  style={{
                    padding: "10px",
                    borderRadius: "2px", 
                    border: "1px solid gray",
                    fontFamily:'sans-serif',
                    fontSize:'15px'
                  }}
                />
              </Box>

             <Box>
             <Typography mt={3}><input type="checkbox" ></input>
               <label  style={{fontFamily:'inherit',marginLeft:'5px'}}>Add to the watchlist on my dashboard</label></Typography>
             </Box>

             <Box mt={6} sx={{}}>
              <button style={{height:'40px',width:'65px',backgroundColor:'#CF4B28',color:'white',border:'1px solid #CF4B28',borderRadius:'5px',fontWeight:'bold'}}>Save</button>
              <button style={{height:'40px',width:'65px',marginLeft:'11px',backgroundColor:'lightgrey',border:'1px solid lightgray',borderRadius:'5px'}}>Cancel</button>
             </Box>
 


            </form>
          </Paper>
        </Grid>
      </Grid>

    </Box>
  )
}
